body:
* Refer to XML files CMS-style
* Add a test analyzer to store detector geometry
* Add a test analyzer to access vectors

To view stored test geometry:
```
$ root cmsDD4HepGeom.root
root [1] TGeoManager *test = dynamic_cast<TGeoManager*>(_file0->Get("world"))
root [2] test->GetTopVolume()->Draw("OGL")
```
